long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The FlexScanMD Barcode Scanner Browser Extension integrates with various Electronic Health Record systems to allow users to scan 2D barcodes from vaccines and medications and automatically populates the NDC, Lot Number, Expiration Date, Manufacturer and Serial Number on the Electronic Health Record vaccine/medication administration page from the scan.

Contact Kestrel Software, LLC for integration with compatible Electronic Health Record systems.
